features: GREEN TEA MATCHA BALANCING TONER: has a significant moisturizing effect that last a long time. Once Upon A Tea gentle alcohol-free facial toner is formulated with effective emollients like Green Tea extract, Aloe Vera, Cucumber and Peppermint essential waters which have been known as pore minimizing and antiseptic abilities that help neutralize the skin irritants. This makes a perfect hydrating treatment that smoothens and immediately refresh the skin
GREEN TEA MATCHA BALANCING TONER: is a perfect pretreatment in any skin care regiment. Return your skin to its timeless state with this cleansing water.

GREEN TEA MATCHA BALANCING TONER: is safe even the most sensitive skin around the eye. Wash and pat skin dry. Keeping eyes closed, spray a fine mist of Green Tea Matcha Balancing Toner over face and neck. Follow up with a serum and moisturizer for best results.

GREEN TEA MATCHA BALANCING TONER: this gentle facial toner is pH-balanced for optimal comfort. Carefully formulated not to over-dry or strip skin of natural oils, this efficacious facial toner provides the ideal preparation for moisture.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: GREEN TEA MATCHA Balancing Toner is formulated to restore your skin’s natural PH balance while giving an instant cooling and soothing effect. Green Tea is naturally rich in antioxidants, which protects your skin from the damaging effect of free radicals, stimulates skin microcirculation and positively influence tone and health of the skin. Cucumber and peppermint essential waters delivers a cooling boost of hydration and neutralizes surface impurities. Aloe Vera soothes the skin, helps to close pores and tighten cell gaps after cleansing, reducing the penetration of impurities and environmental contaminants into the skin. Using the toner on a regular, as a skin care routine will bring your skin healthier complexion, evens skin tone and long-lasting moisturizing effect.

WHY TONER? Gently removes surface debris and remaining residue without stripping skinHelps refine skin textureHydrates, comforts and tones skinFormulated with Green Tea, Aloe Vera, Cucumber and Peppermint essential waters Alcohol-free, Oil- free, pH-balancedFor all skin types

GREEN TEA MATCHA BALANCING TONER Tone, comfort and hydrate skin with Once Upon A Tea gentle alcohol-free facial toner. Formulated with effective emollients like Green Tea extract, Aloe Vera, Cucumber and Peppermint essential waters, this gentle facial toner is pH-balanced for optimal comfort. Carefully formulated not to over-dry or strip skin of natural oils, this efficacious facial toner provides the ideal preparation for moisture. Soothe, tone, refresh, balance with Green Tea MATCHA balancing toner.

KEY INGREDIENTS Green Tea Extract - provides powerful antioxidant protection Aloe Vera - is enrich in essential vitamins and minerals Cucumber and Peppermint essential waters- delivers a cooling boost of hydration

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smells amazing and very refreshing!
reviews.reviewText: This Green Tea Matcha balancing toner spray is amazing! I just finished my first bottle and I loved it , it felt moisturizing and smells amazing. I used it under my makeup and after my makeup to set the makeup and moisturize my face with makeup. Loved this product soo much!! Will definitely be ordering more!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 22, 2019
reviews.reviewText: I love this toner! I've tried a ton of different toners ranging from all natural to drugstore to department stores and this is my favorite. It truly does seem to "balance" my slightly oily skin. It makes it less oily, but by hydrating it, not by stripping all the natural oils. The aromatherapy scent is very mild and never irritates my sensitive redness prone skin. After washing my face I pour a little bit of this into the palms of my hands, rub them together and pat all over my face. I let it set for just under a minute then I apply a moisturizer. I've noticed this toner really ups the moisture in my skin and allows my moisturizer to glide on really well. That extra hydration has really plumped up my skin. You can also remove extra residue from your face after washing it by using a cotton pad to wipe the toner over your face. I use it to wipe around my eyes if I have some eye makeup residue left over. I don't even need an eye cream afterwards because that's how moisturizing this is! Highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 28, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Refreshing and soothing
reviews.reviewText: I love this toner! If I could afford it, I would spritz it all over my body and not just my face. I got it to use during the warmer summer weather. It is light, refreshing and gentle. It feels clean and it works well under all my other products. I just wish the bottle was bigger so it lasted longer. I'm already on my 2nd bottle, i think one bottle lasts about a month? After i wash my face I do spray quite liberally on my face and onto a cotton pad. There is no strong scent and it's not sticky. I've also started spritzing it midday to refresh my face, which feel so nice, which makes me think this would be great if it was spritzed on cold, like out of the fridge!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 28, 2019
reviews.reviewText: I like spraying it on my face in the morning. It feels really good, but am not sure if its actually doing anything for my face. It does feel good though.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 23, 2020
reviews.reviewText: Green Tea Matcha balancing toner is very soothing on my skin. The scent it has is not over powering either. I do like using this product.UpdateI have bought this product so many time since discovering it on Amazon. it is so soothing on my face I couldn't resist introducing my daughter to it. Now we both use it before applying any serums to our face. I intend to send a few bottles home to my friends in the Caribbean.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 22, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars I hate that it has fragrance in it.
reviews.reviewText: I really liked this product but theres one thing that I just dont like and that's that it has fragrance in it and my skin is very sensitive so it really broke out with this toner but thankfully it has gone away.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 20, 2019
reviews.reviewText: I'm very happy with this toner. It is perfect for my face. I have very complicated and demanding sensitive oily kind of skin. And it was always difficult to find something really helpful and organic for my face. I tried a lot of different things and did not really like anything until I tried this magic Green Tea Matcha Balancing Toner. I can see a real change on my skin after starting using it. I definitely recommend this toner. Just try it and you will see a result.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 9, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Yassss Queen (or King)
reviews.reviewText: I freakin love this stuff! It has done wonders for my face. I’ve always had relatively clear skin with the exception of periodic breakouts, but my face gets REALLY dry and it’s an uneven complexion. With that being said, my skin feels clean, clear and moisturized after a spray! It’s super easy and fast, and smells nice (kinda herbal) love that it’s natural. My face truly looks revitalized, moisturized and fresh. I can tell when I haven’t used it. Moderately priced, but it’s worth it! Buying again!
